LanguageData.JRWGeralinuraReconstruct.label: Geralinura
LanguageData.JRWGeralinuraReconstruct.description:
-- > INGEN INTERNAL CASE FILE #034449-1911 [GERALINURA BRITANNICA] CODENAME: ACID >3246
A large, extinct species of vinegaroon. Their claws boast incredible strength, and, when threatened, they can unleash a large cloud of acidic spray from their long, antennae like tail. At smaller sizes, this merely stings, but the sheer size of these specimens can leave severe acid burns.
